Package logic.playerState

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BotBehavior
    Interface implementing the bots abillity to make a valid turn in the game
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Class implements a players board containing cells with Tiles where the dominos can be layed on to.
    BoardTest  
    DefaultAIPlayerTest
    Testclass for the default bot - Checks if position for the next domino - Checks if the right domino was choosen - Further tests that appeared during manual testing
    District
    class representing the players points.
    DistrictTest  
    Player
    Player class the unites the human player with the bots since both variations need to have a board, districts and a gui reference.
    PlayerTest  
    Result
    Class that compares the results of all players and generates the winner.
    ResultRanking
    Class representing a specific rank (e.g. first place, second place, etc.)
    ResultTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Board.Direction
    Directions the board can be dragged to
